about-me_text: I'm a young web developer living in Russia (Krasnodar), I devote most of my time to developing my own small projects and self-improvement, I have been doing web development for about 2 years, during this time I tried Frontend and Backend directions, I write Backend completely only on Node. js (Nest/Express), in the Frontend area I have quite a lot of experience in writing React applications, so now I position myself as a React frontend developer
